      • getInstance

        @NonNull
public static DeviceIDManager getInstance(@NonNull
                                                    android.content.Context context)
        If this.INSTANCE is null, this.INSTANCE is set to a new DeviceIDManager object
        Parameters:
        context - : Application context
        Returns:
        : The current instance of an object of DeviceIDManager type, or a new instance if one doesn’t exist

      • getDeviceID

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String getDeviceID()
        Returns:
        : Returns DeviceID from sharedPreferences, returns generateDeviceID() if it doesn’t exist in sharedPreferences.

      • setDeviceID

        public void setDeviceID(@Nullable
                        java.lang.String deviceID)
        Changes value of key DEVICE_ID_KEY in sharedPreferences to deviceID.
        Parameters:
        deviceID - : The String that the device ID in sharedPreferences will be set to.

      • getNotificationID

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String getNotificationID()
        Returns:
        :

        Returns NotificationID from sharedPreferences. If null, returns empty string.

      • setNotificationID

        public void setNotificationID(@Nullable
                              java.lang.String notificationID)
        Changes value of key NOTIFICATION_ID_KEY in sharedPreferences to notificationID.
        Parameters:
        notificationID - : The value that the notificationID in sharedPreferences will be set to.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the keys DEVICE_ID_KEY and NOTIFICATION_ID_KEY in sharedPreferences.
